dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2115 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent rules related to investment by nonresident aliens in domestic mutual funds and business development companies.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Paulsen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and make permanent rules related to investment by nonresident aliens in domestic mutual funds and business development companies.

section.header: Exemption for certain dividends paid by regulated investment companies to nonresident aliens expanded and made permanent

subsection.header: Exemptions for certain dividends made permanent

paragraph.text: Subparagraph (C) of section 871(k)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking clause (v).
Subparagraph (C) of section 871(k)(2) of such Code is amended by striking clause (v).

subsection.header: Expansion of exemption for interest-Related dividends

paragraph.text: Subparagraph (E) of section 871(k)(1) of such Code is amended by striking clauses (iii) and (iv) and inserting the following new clauses:

clause.text: Any amount referred to in subsection (i)(2)(A) (without regard to the trade or business of the regulated investment company) or in subsection (i)(2)(B).
Any interest which is exempt from tax under section 103 or any other provision of law without regard to the identity of the holder.

Any other amount includible in gross income that is determined by reference to an interest rate and that would not be subject to withholding under section 1441 if received by a nonresident alien individual.
Any amount includible in gross income from sources without the United States.
Any qualified income-related dividend includible in gross income with respect to stock of another regulated investment company.

paragraph.text: Clause (i) of section 871(k)(1)(B) is amended by striking interest (other than interest described in subparagraph (E)(i) or (iii)) and inserting interest described in subparagraph (E)(ii) (and not described in subparagraph (E) (i), (iii), or (iv)).

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (1) of section 871(k) of such Code is amended—

clause.text: by striking interest-related dividend each place it appears in the text and inserting qualified income-related dividend,
by striking qualified net interest income each place it appears in the text and inserting qualified net income,
by striking qualified interest income each place it appears in the text and inserting qualified income,
by striking Interest-related dividends in the heading thereof and inserting Qualified income-related dividends,
by striking Interest related dividend in the heading of subparagraph (C) and inserting Qualified income-related dividend,
by striking Qualified net interest income in the heading of subparagraph (D) and inserting Qualified net income, and
by striking Qualified interest income in the heading of subparagraph (E) and inserting Qualified income.

subparagraph.text: Paragraph (1) of section 881(e) of such Code is amended—

clause.text: by striking interest-related dividend each place it appears in subparagraphs (A) and (B) and inserting qualified income-related dividend,

by striking interest received in subparagraph (B)(ii) and inserting interest described in clause (ii) of section 871(k)(1)(E) (and not described in clause (i), (iii), or (iv) of such section) received,
by striking interest-related dividend received in subparagraph (C) and inserting qualified income-related dividend received from a regulated investment company,
by striking clause (i) or (iii) in subparagraph (C) and inserting clause (i), (iii), or (iv), and
by striking Interest-related dividends in the heading thereof and inserting Qualified income-related dividends.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to dividends with respect to taxable years of regulated investment companies beginning after December 31, 2014.
